summary: 2000 FORD MUSTANG PARKED IN DRIVEWAY WITH EMERGENCY BRAKE ENGAGED.  THE DRIVEWAY HAS A SLIGHT GRADE.  BRAKE FAILED, AND CAR BACKED OUT OF DRIVEWAY AND ACROSS THE ROAD, STRIKING A POLE.  DAMAGE TO LEFT FENDER; BROKEN TAILLIGHT.  THE CAR WAS PREVIOUSLY BROUGHT TO DEALER FOR THE BRAKE RECALL AND SUPPOSEDLY REPAIRED.   *NLM
